descriptionHtml:
[center][center][url=http://www.druidgameworks.com/kickstarter/][img]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/Darkrder/Druid%20Gaming/Dreamtime/Kickstarter%202014/KSTag2014_zps8e255225.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/Lilarcor/LilarcorLogo_zpsfad5f075.png[/img]
[/center]
[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/Lilarcor/LilDescription_zpsd917dee3.png[/img]

Lilarcor originally appeared in the Baldur's Gate series of games and served as comic relief with its various wisecracking comments, as well as its insatible thirst for blood, battle, and glory. Modder's brought Lilarcor into Morrowind and then later on Oblivion.

And now Lilarcor has found his way to Skyrim. The mod re-introduces Lilarcor to the world of the Elder Scrolls, complete with a unique appearance and his trademark humour.

Features:

A Sentient sword with a mind of his own
Lilarcor's Trademark Humour and quirkiness
Over 100+ lines of fully Voice Acted Dialogue
A treasure hunt
Unique High Quality Assets
Lilarcor can be upgraded, each upgrade is visually different

[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/Lilarcor/LilAcquire_zpsb9bdc986.png[/img]

To acquire Lilarcor you will need to first find each of the 4 pieces of Lilarcor scattered around Skyrim. Once you have aquired the 4 pieces of Lilarcor you will need to find an age old manual describing the procress of Reforging, from there you must find a special forge to piece together the Famous sword. To help you along the way you should first seek out a book telling the Tales of Lilarcor.

Your Journey Begins in Riverwood.

[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/Lilarcor/LilInstall_zpsa3641f69.png[/img]

Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
Make sure the Lilarcor.esp is checked in the Launcher

[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/Lilarcor/LilRemove_zpsbacf01ea.png[/img]

Open the Console in-game and type Set aaISLilarcorGlobalRemove to 1, wait for an all clear message, save and exit the game.
Uncheck the Lilarcor.esp is checked in the Launcher
Delete the files/folders associated with the mod

[img]http://i390.photobucket.com/albums/oo346/InsanitySorrow/Lilarcor/LilLegal_zpsbe787cec.png[/img]

You must contact me and obtain my permission before using any content from this mod.

Please do not re-host this file without my explicit permission.
author: InsanitySorrow
